Sigir

April 15, 2019

Demo paper accepted at SIGIR 2019: Arpan Mukherjee, Shubhi Tiwari, Tanya Chowdhury and Tanmoy Chakraborty. Automatic Curation of Content Tables for Educational Videos, SIGIR 2019
